item.title: Is Java Reflection Slow?
item.description: I came across a piece of Java code written by my colleague which uses reflection in a hot code path. I read somewhere that reflection is often slow and should not be used hot code paths. My first instinct was let’s benchmark this and understand what kind of performance speedup we can get.
